Verbose build logs are the same here (gzip and mm.o warnings are removed).

This is the documentation for -n or --no-name:\n\nWhen compressing, do not save the original file name and time stamp by default. (The original name is always saved if the name had to be truncated.) When decompressing, do not restore the original file name if present (remove only the gzip suffix from the compressed file name) and do not restore the original time stamp if present (copy it from th
